description.text: The 4-star Hotel Novotel Paris Porte d'Italie is located on the outskirts of Paris close to the 13th arrondissement. It offers direct access to the center of Paris: the Place d'Italie, the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre, the Opera House, Disneyland and Orly exhibition center (metro 7, tram T3, RER B). The hotel has 3 meeting rooms, a restaurant and a bar, and is ideal for both business trips and stays in Paris as a couple or family. Free WIFI and private car park.

ADVANCE SAVER-Room only
Superior Room with one double bed

The ibis Paris Tolbiac 13ème hotel is located in Paris, 500 m from the Chinese District, 1 km from La Grande Bibliothèque de France and 2 km from the Ministry of Finance. Orly airport is 15 km away. The hotel has 60 air-conditioned rooms with Wifi Internet access (3 are adapted for disabled persons). A bar, snacks 24/24 and outdoor covered pay parking are at your disposal. There is a restaurant close by. Pets accepted.

The ibis Paris Alésia Montparnasse hotel is located in the centre of Paris, 3 km from the Exhibition Centre at Porte de Versailles, 4 km from the Latin Quarter and 5 km from the Eiffel Tower. The airport is 15 km away. The hotel has 264 air-conditioned rooms with Wifi Internet access, including 5 adapted for disabled persons, as well as 8 meeting rooms. LE RESTAURANT, a bar, snacks 24/24, and private covered parking (not free) are at your disposal. Pets accepted.

Rack Rate-Room only
Room for 1 or 2 people.

Located in the heart of Paris, near the Butte aux Cailles district and the Latin Quarter, the Mercure Paris Place d'Italie hotel offers customized services for your meetings. This hotel provides direct access by metro to Gare Montparnasse and Gare d'Austerlitz. It has comfortable rooms with views over the Panthéon and the Eiffel Tower. With family, friends or after a meeting, come and relax in our cozy bar, open 24 hours.

Mercure Breaks-Early / RO-Room only
Standard Room with 1 double bed and 1 single be
d

The best western hotel de weha is a typical parisian three-star "hotel de charme". Located on the left bank (rive gauche), and on the edge of the latin quarter, we are very convenient to cafes, restaurants, cinemas and shops. From the place d italie, there is a good view of the pantheon. Just behind the best western hotel de weha you will find the second largest shopping centre of paris with the famous parisian department store "le printemps". Thanks to its privileged location, the hotel is at a major crossroads for parisian public transport and close to the place d italie station making direct access by either bus or metro to the main parisian sights very easy. The best western hotel de weha is fully renovated and has excellent standards of cleanliness and decor.

The ibis Paris Maine Montparnasse hotel is located in the center of Paris, just 1.2 miles from the Parc des Expositions, 3.1 miles from the Latin Quarter, 4.3 miles from the Champs-Elysées, and 12.4 miles from the airport. The hotel has 102 rooms with WIFI, 2 of which are suitable for people with reduced mobility. Facilities include a bar, 24-hour snack service, and a paying, covered, private car park (narrow entrance). A restaurant is located nearby. Pets are welcome. Our hotel is nonsmoking throughout,

The 4-star Novotel Paris Gare Montparnasse is located in the center of Paris in the Montparnasse district, close to Montparnasse station. It is easily accessed by metro (lines 4, 6, 12 & 13) and close to numerous tourist attractions, including the EiffelTower, Saint-Germain-des-Prés, the Galeries Lafayette and the Quai Branly Museum. The hotel is fully air-conditioned and offers family rooms, restaurant, bar, 4 meeting rooms, private paying car park, fitness center with terrace and free high-speed WIFI.

Superior Suite with one double bed

hotel.name: Hôtel Mercure Paris Ivry Quai de Seine

description.text: Near the Grande Bibliothèque and the Bercy district, your Mercure hotel is also accessible from various highway networks. Enjoy an intimate and cozy atmosphere in one of the contemporary rooms in this 100% non-smoking hotel. Combine relaxation and pleasure and enjoy a French specialty or a drink in our restaurant. Also take advantage of our free covered car park.

The Ibis Paris Porte de Bercy is located next to the Bercy 2 Shopping Centre at Charenton le Pont. Nearby attractions include Bercy Village, the Palais Omnisport de Bercy events centre and the Bois de Vincennes a few minutes away by public transport, which also provides easy access to the delights of Paris. The hotel offers 156 airconditioned rooms, 6 conference rooms, secure pay parking, a restaurant and a bar.

Rack Rate-Room only
Room for 1 or 2 persons

The 4-star Pullman Paris Centre - Bercy hotel is fully renovated and is just a stone's throw from the Palais Omnisport arena and Bercy Village. Admire its bright and modern design, the vibrant atmosphere of the bar, and indulge in the restaurant's tasty cuisine. For a weekend in the city or business meetings, the hotel offers quick access to the center of Paris, the Gare de Lyon and the airports. The Pullman Paris Centre - Bercy hotel boasts 17 meeting rooms, a 300-seat amphitheater and a gym with sauna.

hotel.name: Best Western Plus Quartier Latin Pantheon

description.text: Ideally located in the heart of the Latin Quarter, within walking distance from the rue Mouffetard, The Pantheon, the Botanical Gardens and the National History Museum, and Notre Dame Cathedral. The 37 guest rooms entirely air conditioned in 2005 and redecorated in a modern style in 2006, are all complete with private en suite bathrooms equipped with a bathtub or a shower and hairdryers, remote control cable TV, direct dial phones, automatic alarm clocks, air conditioning and a wireless Internet connection. Access : Métro : 7 Place Monge 10 : cardinal Lemoine Bus : 47, 67, 89 Gare : Austerlitz Gare : Lyon.

The Hotel Novotel Paris Vaugirard Montparnasse is located in the center of Paris between Montparnasse station, the Eiffel Tower and the Porte de Versailles exhibition center. This 4-star hotel is easily accessible by metro and has a convention center andmeeting rooms with views of the Eiffel Tower, making it ideal for seminars. Facilities include a private car park, restaurant-bar with terrace, children's games, fitness room, sauna and free WIFI.

Rack rate-Room only
Superior Room with twin beds

hotel.name: HOLIDAY INN ST GERMAIN DES PRE

description.text: Welcome to HOLIDAY INN Paris St Germain des Pr?s.  Ideally situated in the heart of La Rive Gauche and after a thorough refurbishment  the hotel is only a few minutes from the business centre and railway station of Montparnasse as well as the well known Latin Quarter of Paris.  With the Place Saint Germain des Pr?s also very close, renowned meeting point with restaurants and bars not forgetting the many boutiques on the Boulevard Saint Germain and the excellent shopping centre of Le Bon March?.  The hotel is also very close to many tourist attractions  such as Orsay and Louvre Museums Luxemburg Gardens the Banks of the Seine river Notre Dame Cathedral Pantheon.  All this gives us a prime address in the centre of Paris.  Easy access from Orly and Charles de Gaulle airports by RER train bus or taxi, the hotel is only two  minutes from the St Placide station metro line four.  The hotel has two meeting rooms for seminars and conferences being able to welcome up to fifty persons  Stylish four star hotel ideally located in the heart of Paris few steps away from the bustling and chic area of Saint Germain des Pr?s and from the Montparnasse connected business district and Train station

hotel.name: ibis Paris Porte de Versailles Mairie d'Issy

description.text: The ibis Paris Porte de Versailles hotel is located in the centre of Issy les Moulineaux, 15 km from the airport and 1 km from the Exhibition Centre of Porte de Versailles. You are close to Aquaboulevard (2 km), Montparnasse (5 km) and the Opera House (7km). The hotel has 78 air-conditioned rooms with Wifi Internet access, including 2 adapted for disabled persons. A bar, snacks 24/24, and covered pay parking are at your disposal. You can book 2 meeting rooms.
